notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The following files are available online free of charge: N-gene sequence, figure S1–S10, movie S1–S3, table S1–S4 and supporting references. The Supporting Information is available free of charge at https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acsnano.0c03822.
( PDF)
Screenshots of Au-ASO mix nanoparticles as observed through zetaview ( MP4)
Screenshots of Au-ASO mix nanoparticles as observed through zetaview after the addition of total RNA (1 ng/μL) isolated from the Vero cells infected with SARS-CoV-2 ( MP4)
The movement of agglomerated Au-ASO mix nanoparticles as a string in presence of SARS-CoV-2 RNA ( MP4)
